DOC.detailed_description: The low level laser therapy able improve 4 week treatment , 3 day per week result 12 application low level laser therapy , indicator : The low level laser therapy able improve immediately long term ( 4 week treatment , 3 day per week result 12 application low level laser therapy ) , indirect blood marker muscle damage evaluate enzymatic activity creatine Kinase ( CK ) Lactate Dehydrogenase ( LDH ) visual analog scale ( VAS-F ) fatigue , improve indicator F 2.2 point WHOQOL-100 fatigue , improvement functional indicator low low Extremity functional regard Scale , functional improvement performance execution test stand sit walk test six minute , indicator quality improvement life questionnaire Diabetes Quality Life Measure emotional state questionnaire Problems Areas Diabetes Scale . Eligibility criterion : Diagnosis Diabetes mellitus non-insulin-dependent confirmed individual physician , present 30 70 years.Exclusion criterion : Diagnosis cardiovascular disorder , diagnosis diabetic neuropathy , skin lesion local infection ( quadriceps ) , history musculoskeletal injury last 6 month study , individual unable perform assessment protocol / exercise satisfactory , kind regular physical activity underwent alcohol intake 24 hour stage study .
